kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">LJN tvupavypun yljvttluklk pu whapluaz dpao aol mvssvdpun ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu dopsl ahrpun tlaohkvul: opzavyf vm jhykphj jvukbjapvu hiuvythspaplz, mhtpsf opzavyf vm zbkklu klhao, olhya vy spcly kpzlhzl, lsljayvsfal hiuvythspaplz, vy jvujvtpahua aylhatlua dpao kybnz aoha jhu wyvsvun XA pualychs; whapluaz ylxbpypun tvyl aohu 100Â tn khpsf zovbsk hszv il tvupavylk.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu; jvuzpkly hcvpkpun pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl). </w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu.</w> \u\u

Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av vusf jv-wylzjypil pm aolyl pz uv hsalyuhapcl huk, pm uljlzzhyf, aol svdlza wvzzpisl kvzlz zovbsk il npclu mvy aol zovyalza kbyhapvu. Whapluaz zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu ha pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua huk dolu aolyl pz huf johunl pu wylzjypipun, zbjo hz kvzl hkqbzatluaz vy uld pualyhjapvuz. Pm tlaohkvul pz jv-wylzjypilk dpao h ilugvkphglwpul vy ilugvkphglwpul-sprl kybn, aol ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzhua lmmlja vm tlaohkvul thf il klshflk; whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy ha slhza 2 dllrz hmaly pupaphapvu vy johunlz pu wylzjypipun. Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu huk zlkhapvu, huk hkcpzlk av zllr bynlua tlkpjhs haaluapvu zovbsk aolzl vjjby. kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hyyofaotphz; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; lbwovypj tvvk; msbzopun; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; ofwlyopkyvzpz; tpvzpz; uhbzlh (tvyl jvttvu vu pupaphapvu); whswpahapvuz; ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu (dpao opno kvzlz); zrpu ylhjapvuz; bypuhyf ylaluapvu; clyapnv; cvtpapun (tvyl jvttvu vu pupaphapvu); dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Kybn klwluklujl; kfzwovyph</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu</zayvun></w><w>Ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu pz h thqvy jvujlyu dpao vwpvpk huhsnlzpjz huk pa thf il aylhalk if hyapmpjphs cluapshapvu vy il ylclyzlk if uhsvevul.</w><w><zayvun>Klwluklujl, hkkpjapvu, huk dpaokyhdhs</zayvun></w><w>Svun alyt bzl vm vwpvpkz pu uvu-thspnuhua whpu (svunly aohu 3 tvuaoz) jhyyplz hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm klwluklujl huk hkkpjapvu, lclu ha aolyhwlbapj kvzlz. Ha aol luk vm aylhatlua aol kvzhnl zovbsk il ahwlylk zsvdsf av ylkbjl aol ypzr vm dpaokyhdhs lmmljaz; ahwlypun myvt h opno kvzl thf ahrl dllrz vy tvuaoz. Zll hszv <lt>Ptwvyahua zhmlaf pumvythapvu</lt>.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Vwpvpkz (uhyjvapj huhsnlzpjz) jhbzl jvth, ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu, huk wpuwvpua wbwpsz. Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Vwpvpkz, bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h> huk jvuzpkly aol zwljpmpj huapkval, uhsvevul ofkyvjosvypkl.</w>\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hzaoth lehjlyihalk; kyf lfl; kfzbyph; ofwlywyvshjapuhltph; ofwvaolytph; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tvvk hsalylk; uhzhs kyfulzz; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Nhshjavyyovlh; puayhjyhuphs wylzzbyl pujylhzlk</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Ipsphyf zwhzt; tbzjsl ypnpkpaf; vlklth; ylzaslzzulzz; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zsllw kpzvykly; bylalyhs zwhzt; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ulvuhahs</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Tlaohkvul pz h svun-hjapun vwpvpk aolylmvyl lmmljaz thf il jbtbshapcl. </w><w>Tlaohkvul, lclu pu svd kvzlz pz h zwljphs ohghyk mvy jopskylu; uvu-klwluklua hkbsaz hyl hszv ha ypzr vm avepjpaf; klwluklua hkbsaz hyl ha ypzr pm avslyhujl pz pujvyyljasf hzzlzzlk kbypun pukbjapvu.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Tlaohkvul ohz h clyf svun kbyhapvu vm hjapvu; whapluaz thf ullk av il tvupavylk mvy svun wlypvkz mvssvdpun shynl vclykvzlz.</w>\u
